bibl.title: Six Papyri of the Iliad from the Bodleian Library.

bibl.note: 1. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. g. 16 (P) + P. Berol. Inv. 9813 (= Pack2 581). Iliad I 152-81. Second century. - 2. Ms.Gr.class. e. 58 (P) (= Pack2 598). Iliad I 298-333. Second century. - 3. Ms.Gr.class. e. 126 (P) (= Pack2 660). Iliad II 535-40, 576-601. Third/fourth century. - 4. Ms.Gr.class. f. 42 (P) (= Pack2 768). Iliad V 855-79. First century. - 5. Ms.Gr.class. f. 24 (P) (= Pack2 826). Iliad VIII 198-213. Third/fourth century. - 6. Ms.Gr.class. d. 45 (P) (= Pack2 913). Iliad XIII 584-6, 590-607, 610-3, 621-4, 627-30, 634-40. First/second century.
